description: A large public plaza at the center of Fish-Man Island within the Ryugu Kingdom. The execution site where King Neptune is held captive and where major battles take place.

keyEvents.title: Neptune's Army Defeated
keyEvents.description: The New Fish-Man Pirates completely overwhelm and defeat Neptune's military forces at the plaza.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the overwhelming power of the Energy Steroid-enhanced pirates.

keyEvents.title: The Three Princes Arrive
keyEvents.description: Fukaboshi, Ryuboshi, and Manboshi dramatically arrive at the plaza to challenge the New Fish-Man Pirates.
keyEvents.significance: The arrival of the royal family's strongest warriors provides hope for the citizens.

keyEvents.title: Princes Defeat the Sea Beasts
keyEvents.description: The three princes effortlessly defeat all Energy Steroid-enhanced sea beasts at the plaza.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the princes as formidable warriors.

keyEvents.title: Fukaboshi's Speech
keyEvents.description: Fukaboshi delivers an impassioned speech about peace and discrimination to the people gathered at the plaza.
keyEvents.significance: Articulates the central philosophical conflict of the Fish-Man Island arc.

keyEvents.title: The Three Princes Defeated
keyEvents.description: The princes are brutally defeated by Hody's Energy Steroid-enhanced officers at the plaza.
keyEvents.significance: A crushing defeat that eliminates hope of conventional rescue.

historicalSignificance: Gyoncorde Plaza is the same location where Queen Otohime was assassinated, making it a symbolically significant battleground where her vision of peace is tested against violent extremism.

culturalNotes.note: The name is a pun on the Japanese word for 'fish' (魚, gyo) and the Concorde Plaza in Paris, where King Louis XVI was executed.

description: A rundown district of Fish-Man Island where orphans and outcasts gather. The base of operations for the New Fish-Man Pirates and the location of the Flying Dutchman.

keyEvents.title: Vander Decken's Plot
keyEvents.description: At the Fish-Man District, Vander Decken IX formulates his plan to destroy everything using the Flying Dutchman.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the impending threat that will escalate the crisis.

historicalSignificance: The Fish-Man District is where children who grew up hearing hatred against humans reside, serving as the breeding ground for Hody Jones's extremist ideology.
